import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {Dropdown} from "../../../components/buttons/Dropdown"; import {SideOverlay} from "./SideOverlay" import axios from "axios"; /* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ export const GenresPage = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [formType, setFormType] = useState(true) const [genre, setGenre] = useState({}) const [genres, setGenres] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('/api/user/get-user-genres') .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) setGenre(res.data) }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) },[]) const handleAdd = () =>{ setOpen(true) setFormType(true) } const handleView = (e, gen) =>{ setGenre(gen) setOpen(true) setFormType(false) } return ( <>

Genres

desc

{genres.map((gen) => ( ))}
Name Status Options
{gen.name}
{gen.description}
 {gen.isActive ? ( Active ): ( Not Active )} handleView(e, gen)} className="text-sky-400 hover:text-sky-500 cursor-pointer"> Edit
) }
